title: Certainly the most amazing videos ever [plug]
content:
I made these videos in 2005 and 2007, and they have made me into a celebrity... at my school. I want worldwide exposure! Go watch these and your life will be changed forever.

Plus, you can see what I looked like 2 years ago.

[url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=dfpO7XhuETA]Where's Jeff?[/url]
[url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=cRim7QvLGlM]Where's Jeff? - Deluxe Edition[/url]
[url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=izxrocVNVOk]Dnde Esta Jeff?[/url] (this is the best, personally)

Sorry, I just had to do this.

title: Re: Certainly the most amazing videos ever [plug]
content:
Ahahaha. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]

That is definitely a classic. I'll be sure to spam it to some folks to enhance your fame.

Dnde Esta Jeff? is great. It takes the best clips and crops them to perfection. For example, the rubbish bin one loses its impact when you drop out of character and walk toward the camera in the original.

Much applause to thee.

title: Re: Certainly the most amazing videos ever [plug]
Re: Certainly the most amazing videos ever [plug]
content:
CommanderSpleen said:[hr]I'll be sure to spam it to some folks to enhance your fame.[hr][img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] Thank you, that would be excellent. My goal is to one day get it sent to myself in a spam email.

And I totally agree with you on the "garbage" part, but the guy who filmed it wanted to leave it in. Donde Esta was the only one that was edited without him.

And thanks, Levelass, for the incredibly vague comment [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] -----------------------------------
[url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=izxrocVNVOk]Dnde Esta Jeff? [/url]
Take a look at these hands! The hands speaks. The hand of a government man.
